name: SimplyCiv
description:
Greetings, honourable ruler! Do you have what it takes to win?

SimplyCiv, inspired from Sid Meier's Civilization series, is a text based strategy game where you control an empire, guiding their way to victory. Choose a path to victory, and destroy, trade or ally with 3 computer civilizations with custom names and randomised traits! The game is played on the command line, with all player input received through the keyboard. Game time can vary between 2 and 15 minutes, depending on difficulty.

This is my first game I have released, so feedback is greatly appreciated!

SimplyCiv has now been officially released!
